00031   class BaseArray:  public Package
00032 {
00033  public:                                                         
00034   BaseArray( int top, int bottom = 0, sizeType aDelta = 0 );
00035   virtual ~BaseArray();
00036   
00037   int             bottomBound() const 
00038                    { return bottombound; }
00039   int             topBound() const 
00040                    { return topbound; }
00041   sizeType        arraySize() const;
00042   
00043   virtual BoxIterator& initIterator() const;
00044   
00045   virtual void            add( Item& ) = 0;
00046   void          remove( int i ) { pickOut( i, 1 ); }
00047   void          pickOut( int, int = 0 );
00048   
00049   virtual   void            pickOut( const Item&, int = 0 );
00050   
00051   virtual classType       myNo() const = 0;
00052   virtual char           *myName() const = 0;
00053   virtual int             isEqual( const Item& ) const;
00054   virtual   void            printContentsOn( ostream& ) const;
00055   
00056  protected:
00057   Item&         itemAt( int i ) const
00058   { return *theArray[ i - bottombound ]; }
00059   void          reallocate( sizeType );
00060   sizeType      delta;
00061   int               bottombound;
00062   int               topbound;
00063   int               whereToAdd;
00064   Item        **theArray;
00065   
00066   friend  class ArrayIterator;
00067 };
00068 
00069 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00070   inline sizeType BaseArray::arraySize() const
00071 {
00072   return sizeType( topbound - bottombound + 1 );
00073 }

00078  public:
00079   ArrayIterator( const BaseArray& );
00080   virtual ~ArrayIterator();

00091 };
